Name: Tower Attack
About the game: In traditional Tower Defense games, you're always on the defense, waiting for waves of enemies to come to you. In Tower Attack, you are the one bringing it to them. You go as far as you could in a procedurally-generated map, and kill as many enemies as you could with the help of towers.
